info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 1:21AM MDT until September 04 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM MDT FOR LIBERTY...TOOLE...WESTERN HILL AND NORTHWESTERN CHOUTEAU COUNTIES... At 121 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 32 miles northeast of Sunburst to 8 miles northwest of Chester to 14 miles northwest of Fort Benton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Chester, Inverness, Lothair, Joplin, The Knees, Hingham, Oilmont, Rudyard, Tiber Dam, Galata, Loma, Whitlash, Kenilworth, Ferdig, Devon and Dunkirk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
